items.sentence: My father bought this house for us when we got married.
My father encouraged me to learn how to play the piano.
My father was completely bald by the time he was forty.
My friend copied my homework and the teacher found out.
My mother happened to be there when the fire broke out.
My mother tasted the soup and added a little more salt.
Four people were in the car when the accident happened.
French is definitely not the easiest language to learn.
Get yourself some popcorn, sit back and enjoy the show.
Tom and I aren\'t going to study together this evening.
Tom and I weren\'t the only ones who needed to do that.
Tom and I weren\'t the only ones who wanted to do that.
What was the last really difficult thing you had to do?
What would you do if you saw a man from another planet?
Tom wasn\'t scared of Mary, but Mary was scared of him.
Tom will be disappointed if you don\'t go to his party.
Tom worked at the restaurant that Mary\'s father owned.
Tom found the hat Mary was looking for in the basement.
Tom gorges himself whenever he eats at that restaurant.
Tom has invited me to come and stay with him in Boston.
